jokes.text: Tried to find my new office in the New Administrative Capital using GPS this morning. The app got confused and told me to 'Turn left at the 4,000-year-old sphinx then take the monorail to the future.' I ended up in 2030, but I still couldn't find a parking spot. Some things never change, ya basha! ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¬ğŸš—
